forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: sun light

comments.text: to bring up the sun in your area, click on your ring to open the main dialog, then click on the mountain icon to go to the area dialog.
in this dialog, grab the top shape to the right (a cone), and rotate it, color it, or resize it. [youtube: 4p-tCznGAOU]
more environment shapes are available to adjust the environment light, fog, clouds and more.

thread.latestCommentText: more environment shapes are available to adjust the environment light, fog, clouds and more.
